body_html:
This will need to be fixed. We can't have imports in nn.Module.__call__. It's a function that's in the hot path and import statements are expensive!

Also, Ed please give me at least 24h to review PRs. It's not this much.

body:
This will need to be fixed. We can't have imports in `nn.Module.__call__`. It's a function that's in the hot path and `import` statements are expensive! 

Also, Ed please give me at least 24h to review PRs. It's not this much.
